## Welcome to my website!

{{< include /chunks/intro.qmd >}}

#### Research Focus:

1. **Transportation Research**: I study human behavior in sustainable transportation using discrete choice models. My work focuses on smart charging [adoption](/projects/2024-sc-adoption) and [economy](/projects/2025-smc-economy) analysis, providing insights to help policymakers and utilities design better systems that benefit both the grid and EV owners.
2. **Open-Source Software**: I develop open-source tools for survey construction and data analysis. [surveydown](/projects/2024-surveydown) is a flexible platform for creating surveys with {{< var rnolink >}}, Quarto, and Shiny. [sdstudio](/projects/2025-sdstudio) is a companion GUI for surveydown.
